code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import NavScrollExample from'./Navbar';import Axiosinstance from'../../config/Axiosinstances';import Table from'react-bootstrap/Table';import'./Playerbid.css';import{toastError,toastSucess}from'../../constants/Plugin';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TeamPage(){const[teams,setTeams]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchTeams();},[]);const fetchTeams=async()=>{try{const response=await Axiosinstance.get('/users/getteams');setTeams(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching groups:',error);}};const handleDeleteCourt=async(groupId,teamId)=>{try{await Axiosinstance.delete("/users/deleteteam/".concat(groupId,"/").concat(teamId));fetchTeams();toastSucess("Deleted successfully");}catch(error){toastError('Internal server error');console.error('Error deleting court:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavScrollExample,{}),teams.map(group=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("u",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center",style:{fontFamily:'sans-serif'},children:group.groupName})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{striped:true,bordered:true,hover:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"TEAM NAME"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"POINTS"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:group.teams.map(team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between",children:[team.teamName,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dclose",onClick:()=>handleDeleteCourt(group._id,team._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"de","aria-hidden":"true",children:"\xD7"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:team.price})]},team._id))})]})]},group._id))]});}export default TeamPage;
